synopsis: Xia Qiu, the minor leader of Shenzhao Sect, was invited back by his brother Xia Chun, but Serendipity found the weird research in the secret room. In order to find out Xia Chun’s secret, he went to Fudang Pond to explore the truth, but was persecuted by his brother and made a sacrifice to the ancient ferocious beast Feilian. By chance, Fei Lian boarded Xia Qiu’s body. At the same time, he also lost his original strength and was saved by the girl Long Yan who happened to meet him. After waking up, he disguised himself as the youngest son of the Long family, Takazawa, and began a brand new life and adventure under the arrangement of the leader of the Long family, Takashi. Along the way, Longze met many friends and gradually experienced family and friendship that he had never experienced before. The good times are not long, and the powerful power hidden in his body leads to frequent crises around him. The constantly revealed power of competition has repeatedly injured and even killed his friends around him… In the end, the growing Long Ze reconciled with the power in his body, successfully resolving the biggest crisis and rescuing his companions who were bound away by evil power. However, the mysterious person who controls the entire chessboard took off his mask and turned out to be his brother Xia Chun, and even greater doubts have gathered
